description: See README in https://github.com/aocks/ox_task for details.
This is an example of how to define which tasks to run.
The weather alert task references a local script relative to
the working directory where the task runs while the news alert
task illustrates how to download a script from GitHub and run that.
Note: you will need to setup TO_EMAIL, FROM_EMAIL, and GMAIL_APP_PASSWD
secrets in GitHub (see the README for this project for details).
